messages.body: $TSLA Tesla needs to get with it. BEHIND AGAIN! Mercedes starts production of all-electric Urban eTruck. https://electrek.co/2017/02/17/mercedes-benz-etruck-production-all-electric/#more-37661

links.title: Mercedes-Benz starts 'small series production' of all-electric Urban eTruck and trials with customers
links.description: Exciting news coming out of Germany today. Mercedes-Benz announced that it started small series production of its first all-electric heavy truck, the Urban eTruck, and launched trials with customers in order to test the vehicle's capacity on urban routes. The company has been moving quickly on this project.

links.title: Tesla is now claiming 35% battery cost reduction at 'Gigafactory 1' - hinting at breakthrough cost below $125/kWh
links.description: Recent studies show that average electric vehicle battery cost dropped 80% in 6 years down to ~$227/kWh. It's exciting progress for the electric vehicle industry, but it's still not enough to make long-range electric cars affordable.

links.title: Korean Celebrity Sues Tesla, Claiming Model X Sped Up On Its Own
links.description: Ji-chang Son, a South Korean actor, singer, and songwriter is suing Tesla Motors for what he says is a spontaneous acceleration of his Model X which crashed through his house in September 2016 Ji-chang Son is suing Tesla Motors for product liability, negligence, and breaches of warranty and is seeking unspecified damages The suit, filed...

links.title: WATCH: SpaceX rocket blasts off from historic Apollo launchpad
links.description: Elon Musk's SpaceX will launch a Falcon 9 rocket at 10:01 a.m. Saturday from the historic Kennedy Space Center launchpad used by the Apollo missions. The mission is the private space company's 10th resupply mission to the International Space Station.
